text: Asteroids found: 1576 (as of July 2006) Only a few unusual ones are listed here 2135 Aristaeus April 17, 1977 Apollo asteroid 3122 Florence March 2, 1981 Amor asteroid 3240 Laocoon November 7, 1978 Trojan asteroid # with Eleanor F. Helin Schelte John "Bobby" Bus (born in 1956) is an astronomer at the University of Hawaii Institute for Astronomy. Bus has found or co-found over 1,000 asteroids as well as the comet 87P/Bus. 3254 Bus was named after him by Edward L. G. Bowell when he found it in 1982. == References == == Other websites == * Bus' Personal Home Page Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Asteroid discoverers Category:American astronomers Category:University of Hawai ªi faculty
title: Schelte J. Bus
